attributes.action: Release for prisoners that have not committed violent or sexual offences .
attributes.additional_details: To support elderly and vulnerable family members during the corona virus crisis.
attributes.background: Immediate realised under police supervision for prisoners that have not committed violent or sexual offences to support elderly and vulnerable family members to cope with the corona virus crises.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305604

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
